# AsyncStream

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/AsyncStream" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

This class supports async iteration to process chunks as they arrive from the model.


**Alias to:** `mirascope_v2_llm.responses.AsyncStream`
